channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Open Source -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Open Source -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32672|2024-05-09T06:54:10.130Z -- samsung%20open%20source -- escargot
item.description:
A Segmentation Fault issue discovered in
Samsung Open Source Escargot JavaScript engine
allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted input.
This issue affects Escargot: 4.0.0.
